name: Dojo Slash
description:
Ninjas from an opposing clan have invaded your dojo.
There is only one thing to do: defend it to death.

Features:
Gorgeous pixel art
60 fps smooth gameplay
Juicy sound effects & adrenaline-pumping soundtrack
Level up & skill point system
Increasingly challenging levels
12 types of enemy with sophisticated AI
Deadly boss fight
Roguelike features
Many weapons for purchase with in-game coins (not IAP)
In App Purchase: Ad removal

Features NOT included:
Annoying requests for permission
Push notifications
Pay-to-win
